ingredients.ingredient: 4 strips bacon, cut into 1-inch pieces, or more to taste
1 medium head cabbage - cored, cut into eighths, and sliced

cookingTips: Cook bacon until crispy and use the rendered fat to cook cabbage
Add water to create steam and help soften the cabbage, creating a smothered texture
The optional sugar balances the spice and acidity; adjust cayenne to taste preference
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the 'smothering' technique of using steaming liquid and how layers of bacon fat flavor the dish.
